lcInstruction.p: The Introduction to Reuse course covered these topics:

ul.li: Creating reusable topics—how to write for reuse, along with best practices for reusing paragraphs, steps, and list items.
Reusing topics and maps—how to use DITA map elements to reuse topics and submaps.
Using content references—how to use the conref attribute, how content references behave in different situations, what to look out for, and some best practices in using content references.

lcInstruction.p: This course builds on these principles and ideas by introducing you to keys, advanced content references, and conditions (filtering).
